---
title: "trackman_modeling"
output: html_document
---

# Load tidyverse
library(tidyverse)

# Load example Trackman data
data <- read_csv("../data/rapsodo_sample.csv")

# View basic metrics
glimpse(data)
summary(data)

# Quick plot: VBreak vs Spin Rate
ggplot(data, aes(x = spin_rate, y = vert_break)) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_minimal()
